News & Announcements

  1. New Shelter for Mackenzie

    Look for improvements on Main Street beginning Monday, April 1st! Read on...

  2. Restaurant Week and Selfie Contest

    Next week is Restaurant Week!! Read on...

  3. Master Vision Plan Available for Viewing!

    Design Collective visited Mount Airy on March 21st for the Final Presentation of the Mount Airy Downtown Master Vision Plan! Read on...

  4. The Resourceful Entrepreneur Series

    Are you a small business owner? Here's an opportunity to attend a creative 90-minute seminar served with light breakfast, coffee, and local company. Read on...

  1. Town Hall is Looking for a new Town Administrator

    After many years of dedicated service, Town Hall is sorry to announce that we are looking for a replacement for Monika Weierbach, our Town Administrator. Read on...

  2. ETHICS COMMISSION MEETING TO BE HELD ON THURSDAY, APRIL 4, 2019 AT 7:00 P.M.

    The Commission is meeting to review financial disclosure statements of the candidates for Town Council to fill the three vacant Town Council seats in the upcoming May 6, 2019. The public is invited to attend. Read on...

  3. Town Council Agenda and Agenda Items -April 2019

    Town Council Agenda and Agenda Items -April 2019 Read on...
